title: Pistou soup
description: A light, spicy twist on a traditional summer vegetable soup. French ‘pistou’ is a distant relative of the Italian pesto, but my version reflects the Vietnamese influence on modern French food.
ingredients: 1 bunch of Vietnamese or Thai basil, chopped
½ small red chilli, seeds removed
4 garlic cloves, crushed to a paste
200g/7oz green beans, cut into small pieces
100g/3½oz dried pasta (a small variety like orzo)
1 x 400g/14oz tin white beans (e.g. haricots blancs, cannellini), drained and rinsed
